betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Powered Spawner§r is used like a normal spawner except it §eneeds power in order to spawn mobs§r. 

To make a §eproper working Powered Spawner§r, you'd need a §6Broken Spawner§r of the mob you want to spawn. If the Broken Spawner does not have what you wish to spawn, you have to §econvert the Broken Spawner's Mob Type by combining the Broken Spawner and a §6Soul Vial§e that has the corresponding mob in a §6Soul Binder§r. This will §achange the Broken Spawner's Mob to the Soul Vial's mob instead§r. 

To actually set the Powered Spawner's mob, you'll need to §emerge the Broken Spawner with it in an §6Anvil§r.

To make one of these, you'll need four §6Electrical Steel Ingot§rs, two §6Vibrant Crystal§rs, a §6Z-Logic Controller§r, a §6Soul Machine Chassis§r, and §eany Mob Head§r.
